wikipedia_page.main: Martyn Madden (born 4 December 1973 in Cardiff) is a Welsh former rugby union player. Madden made his debut for the Wales national team on 8 June 2002 against the Springboks. A prop forward, he played club rugby for Llanelli Scarlets.
